headline: Republic of Ireland Women U-19s hold European champions
summary: Republic of Ireland held on against a dominant Spain to draw 0-0 in their opening match at the UEFA Women’s U-19 Euros. Katie Keane made a flying save to keep out a hooked effort by […]

headline: Aston Villa Women recruit England forward Katie Robinson
summary: Aston Villa have signed 21-year-old former Brighton & Hove Albion forward Katie Robinson on a two-year deal. She played over 60 times for the Seagulls, has a dozen caps for England U-23s, five for the […]

headline: 2024-25 FA Women’s National League fixtures released
summary: The FA Women’s National League 2024-25 fixtures have been announced, with the new season getting underway on Sunday 18 August. The opening day will see Dulwich Hamlet play their first-ever FA WNL game at home […]

headline: Northern Ireland Women’s U-19s denied late winner by Hungary
summary: Northern Ireland’s U-19s drew 1-1 with Hungary in a friendly international at Ballyclare Comrades FC on Sunday 14 July. Head coach Gail Redmond chose a 20-strong squad, as she began to integrate several new players […]

headline: Women’s Pre-Season Friendlies Round-up – 14 July
summary: Results from the weekend’s pre-season friendlies featured a 3-1 win for Wolves after conceding the first goal at Peterborough United. In a number of cases, clubs opted not to publicise the scoreline from a friendly […]

headline: England Women’s U-19s net ten against Lithuania
summary: England overran tournament hosts Lithuania in their opening group game at the UEFA Women’s U-19 Championship. John Griffiths’ side raced into a three-goal lead inside quarter of an hour, Poppy Pritchard following up a parry […]

headline: Women’s international friendlies feature Olympic warm-ups
summary: Among the Olympics warm-up friendlies, Sunderland’s Katie Kitching scored for New Zealand and Canada came from behind to beat Australia.  Kitching netted a 67th-minute penalty to earn New Zealand a 1-1 draw with Zambia, who […]

headline: Denmark, France and Iceland qualify for UEFA Women’s EURO 2025
summary: Iceland beat Germany 3-0 to book their place at UEFA Women’s EURO 2025, Denmark and France also secured their berths. League A Group 1 – Finland 1-1 Norway, Netherlands 0-0 Italy Netherlands still lead their […]

headline: England Women see off Ireland to close in on Euro finals
summary: England’s 2-1 win over Republic of Ireland puts them within a point of qualifying for UEFA Women’s Euro 2025. A draw away to Sweden in the final games next Tuesday will keep the Lionesses above […]

headline: Wales Women point away from promotion after win in Croatia
summary: Wales are in a good position to win UEFA Women’s Euro Qualifying League B Group 4 after a 3-0 victory in Croatia. Avoiding defeat on Tuesday against Kosovo at Parc y Scarlets in Llanelli will […]
